name: thePodamCollectionAnnotationShouldWorkOnAllCollections

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.CollectionAnnotationPojo

Then the object CollectionAnnotationPojo ( strList = [GQ71stKx3q, RhCjsCgMPK, 8iydfDzgbV, Td8kp9nN_y, ayYcg6x1D9]    strArray = [SMT17MW_4L, 1H0Ub8EzfX, UxqI5rM7JS, 25_4LQIi6k, OWIcNox_mQ]    stringMap = {9WZx7YJpGW=et4Aw7GWUe, BFHeugfrAR=u2h8R3lnwJ, ConYssmO5o=Dq3NpNvTzS, nwfjJYbgYF=j4nQAsbAuI, PXmx8LFDwk=BSu5wJtkL_}     ) should not be null
Then the collection should have should have elements of type class java.lang.String and exactly 5 elements

children.description: Then the collection should not be null or empty and each element should be of type class java.lang.String
Then the collection should have exactly 5 elements

testSteps.description: Then the given array should not be null or empty and contain elements of type class java.lang.String
Then the array should have exactly 5 elements
Then the map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type class java.lang.String and value of type class java.lang.String and have exactly 5 elements

children.description: Then the Map should not be null or empty and each element should have key of type class java.lang.String and value of type class java.lang.String

title: The @PodamCollection annotation should allow to set sizes on all collections and arrays
